#summary Listing of all view helper functions.
#labels chapter,0.9.1

These functions can be called from the views to create output for use in a HTML page.

==Example==

`views/blog/listauthors.cfm`:

{{{
<cfoutput>
  #paginationLinks(action="listArticles", windowSize=5)#
</cfoutput>
}}}

==Functions==

*Content:*
 * [contentForLayout contentForLayout()]
 * [includePartial includePartial()]

*Errors:*
 * [errorMessageOn errorMessageOn()]
 * [errorMessagesFor errorMessagesFor()]

*Forms (object properties):*
 * [checkBox checkBox()]
 * [dateSelect dateSelect()]
 * [dateTimeSelect dateTimeSelect()]
 * [fileField fileField()]
 * [hiddenField hiddenField()]
 * [passwordField passwordField()]
 * [radioButton radioButton()]
 * [select select()]
 * [timeSelect timeSelect()]
 * [textArea textArea()]
 * [textField textField()]

*Forms (plain tags):*
 * [checkBoxTag checkBoxTag()]
 * [dateSelectTags dateSelectTags()]
 * [dateTimeSelectTags dateTimeSelectTags()]
 * [daySelectTag daySelectTag()]
 * [endFormTag endFormTag()]
 * [fileFieldTag fileFieldTag()]
 * [hiddenFieldTag hiddenFieldTag()]
 * [hourSelectTag hourSelectTag()]
 * [minuteSelectTag minuteSelectTag()]
 * [monthSelectTag monthSelectTag()]
 * [passwordFieldTag passwordFieldTag()]
 * [radioButtonTag radioButtonTag()]
 * [secondSelectTag secondSelectTag()]
 * [selectTag selectTag()]
 * [startFormTag startFormTag()]
 * [submitTag submitTag()]
 * [textAreaTag textAreaTag()]
 * [textFieldTag textFieldTag()]
 * [timeSelectTags timeSelectTags()]
 * [yearSelectTag yearSelectTag()]

*Links:*
 * [buttonTo buttonTo()]
 * [linkTo linkTo()]
 * [mailTo mailTo()]
 * [paginationLinks paginationLinks()]

*Media:*
 * [imageTag imageTag()]
 * [javaScriptIncludeTag javaScriptIncludeTag()]
 * [styleSheetLinkTag styleSheetLinkTag()]
